It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 42 43 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 44 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 45 hash_exponential_size_policy(size_type start_size, size_type grow_factor) : 46 m_start_size(start_size), 47 m_grow_factor(grow_factor) 48 { } 49 50 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 51 void 52 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 53 swap(PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) 54 { 55 std::swap(m_start_size, other.m_start_size); 56 std::swap(m_grow_factor, other.m_grow_factor); 57 } 58 59 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 60 typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::size_type 61 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 62 get_nearest_larger_size(size_type size) const 63 { 64 size_type ret = m_start_size; 65 while (ret <= size) 66 { 67 const size_type next_ret = ret* m_grow_factor; 68 if (next_ret < ret) 69 __throw_insert_error(); 70 ret = next_ret; 71 } 72 return ret; 73 } 74 75 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 76 typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::size_type 77 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 78 get_nearest_smaller_size(size_type size) const 79 { 80 size_type ret = m_start_size; 81 while (true) 82 { 83 const size_type next_ret = ret* m_grow_factor; 84 if (next_ret < ret) 85 __throw_resize_error(); 86 if (next_ret >= size) 87 return (ret); 88 ret = next_ret; 89 } 90 return ret; 91 } 92 93 #endif
